timeline.message: Moved getting of reference files for projects into the reference file ajax controller. Updated tests

timeline.bodyText: Same as your controller method, do we really need the /all at the end?  What might be a better pattern here is /ajax/reference-files?projectId=4 or something similar.  That way we know exactly when we write that url that is for a project.  Food for thought.
timeline.author: joshsadam

replies.bodyText: Nope that's a good idea. Updated in b0250f6
replies.author: deepsidhu85

timeline.message: Updated url for getting reference files for projects
